issue.title: Update robot model to match real atlas

content.raw:
I concur.  The existing model should be updated to include the mass and geometry of the hydraulic power back pack.

While NIST is supposed to validate, we can't wait on that.  Please update with the current best CAD data, and then revise periodically as NIST updates information.

I concur. The existing model should be updated to include the mass and geometry of the hydraulic power back pack.

While NIST is supposed to validate, we can't wait on that. Please update with the current best CAD data, and then revise periodically as NIST updates information.
